prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a round body and muscular arms, showcasing its strength.
Imagine a Pokemon that excels in both fighting and swimming, with a spiral pattern on its belly.
Generate a blue and white Pokemon known for its powerful punches and aquatic agility.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in wetland habitats and has a unique spiral design.
Design a bipedal Pokemon that balances strength and speed, perfect for battling in water.
Make a Pokemon that is both adorable and fierce, with a distinct whirlpool pattern.
Give me a water-fighting type Pokemon that can easily adapt to different environments.
